content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine
inventory=[{"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 13, "index": 11}, {"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 40, "index": 13}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 48, "index": 14}, {"type": "diamond_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 21, "index": 19}, {"type": "tropical_fish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 18, "index": 20}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 3, "index": 24}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 25}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 43, "index": 26}, {"type": "glowstone", "quantity": 64, "index": 27}, {"type": "lime_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 20, "index": 31}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass", "quantity": 57, "index": 32}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 4, "index": 33}, {"type": "spruce_fence", "quantity": 63, "index": 34}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 55, "index": 36}, {"type": "nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 5, "index": 39}, {"type": "cod", "quantity": 27, "index": 43}]
thought: I need to craft prismarine, which requires 4 prismarine_shard to be placed in a 2x2 square. I will first move the first prismarine_shard from slot 33 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 1 with quantity 1
